ygData.subject: Re: Strange rune
ygData.msgSnippet: These 3 rune pieces are part of a quest given by the centaur in South Karana for warrior only crafted armor.  Details of the quest can be found on Eq Lizer -
ygData.messageBody:
These 3 rune pieces are part of a quest given by the centaur in South Karana
for warrior only crafted armor. Details of the quest can be found on
Eq'Lizer - Quests - South Karana.

-Shadowwalker

----- Original Message -----
From: Dominic Marier <hobitus@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 1:09 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Strange rune


> From: "Dominic Marier" <hobitus@...>
>
> Hi,
> in my travel i have come across a strange rune. it's 3 pieces of a
> broken rune. if i cast identify on it, it says Rune of Dwarf (bottom), and
> Rune of Dwarf (Middle). i'm still searching for the top piece. i wonder
> which spell the rune of dwarf is used for and how to repair the rune
maybe
> hit combine in the lexicon?). i've found those 2 rune on the evil eye in
> runnyeye ( not in beholder). Anyone got information on this?
>
>
> Gydgith Lightweaver, Bristlebane
>
>
